item.title: 17 Short Hair Styles For Round Face Man Pictures
item.description: 17+ Short Hair Styles For Round Face Man Pictures. Men with a round face should choose a hairstyle, which makes their face look a bit longer than usual. Choosing the right type of hairstyle suiting the shape of your face can make you look attractive and sexier. Best Hairstyles For Round Faces For Men from www.menshairstyletrends.com Super short crops with a side part and a side sweep.
